goals.name: Toggle End-of-cycle Chime
goals.summary: Turn the signal chime on or off.

steps.text: Tap the 'Options' button to open the menu.
Rotate the dial to navigate to 'Signal'.
Press 'Spin Speed' to toggle the chime.
